input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Club Monaco Elasticated Poplin Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Commission Classic-Fit Pants in Warpstreme Fabric'
  - Name='Rhone Navy Solid Chino Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Tech Men's Chino Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Commuter Performance Stretch Chino Pants'
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Stretch Washed Chino 2.0 Athletic Fit Pants'
  - Name='Dockers Classic Fit Signature Iron Free Khaki With Stain Defender Pants Men's'
  - Name='Banana Republic Tapered Rapid Movement Chino'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's AirSense Faux Wool Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Commuter Chino Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Pursuit Pant'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 32L Utilitech Pants'
  - Name='SLIM COMMUTER | Rhone 01-BLACK / 40'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit 32L Smooth Twill Trousers'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Wovenair Trousers'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Straight Fit Chino Pants'
  - Name='Italian Brushed 5-Pocket Pants Slim for Men by Bonobos'
  - Name='Men's Slim Summerweight Chino'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Straight Chino Pants'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Thompson Four-Season Wool Blend Suit Pant'
  - Name='Club Monaco Corduroy 5-Pocket Straight Pant'
  - Name='Rhone Rh√¥ne Commuter Tech Twill Slim Chino Pant'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 34L Warpstreme Trousers'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trousers in 30L Smooth Twill'
  - Name='Men's Slim Summerweight Chino'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Club Monaco Elasticated Poplin Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Poplin pants generally have a lighter, dressier fabric compared to traditional chinos; elasticated waist also suggests more casual or athleisure styling, differing from the tailored chino fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Commission Classic-Fit Pants in Warpstreme Fabric
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Commission pants are classic-fit chinos made with technical fabric for comfort and stretch, somewhat similar in silhouette and purpose but with more performance focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Navy Solid Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Named as chinos with a classic approach, likely similar fit and purpose; manufactured by Rhone, a performance menswear brand, may differ slightly in fabric tech but close in core.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Tech Men's Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tech chinos imply a performance enhancement to the classic chino design; still closely related to the reference product but with added technical features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Commuter Performance Stretch Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chino pants designed for commuting with stretch and performance fabric; functionally and stylistically close with added mobility.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bonobos Men's Stretch Washed Chino 2.0 Athletic Fit Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are chinos with washed fabric and a tailored athletic fit; aligns well with the reference's focus on comfort, fabric treatment, and tailored silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Classic Fit Signature Iron Free Khaki With Stain Defender Pants Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit chinos with stain resistance and wrinkle-free features; similar silhouette but with more functional fabric treatments.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Tapered Rapid Movement Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tapered chinos designed for rapid movement, suggesting performance enhancements in a traditional chino style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Men's AirSense Faux Wool Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Faux wool pants differ in fabric, likely heavier and more formal than chinos; less relevant based on material and typical use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Commuter Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Directly a chino pant aimed at commuters; very similar in style and functionality to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Pursuit Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pursuit Pant is likely more performance-oriented and may deviate in style and fabric from a traditional chino, less similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 32L Utilitech Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: ABC pants are technical chinos with classic fit designed for all-day wear; reasonably close but with more emphasis on technical fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: SLIM COMMUTER | Rhone 01-BLACK / 40
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim commuter pants from Rhone likely share traits with chinos but focus on slim, performance silhouette which may differ from traditional cut.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit 32L Smooth Twill Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-fit technical chinos in twill fabric; similar construction and styling but slimmer fit and technical fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Wovenair Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical slim chinos with a lighter, woven fabric for breathability; similar in silhouette and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Straight Fit Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight fit chinos are very similar in silhouette and function to the reference product's tailored straight chino style.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim summerweight chinos align well with the reference‚Äôs silhouette and fabric style, assuming similar cotton construction.
